content: CFS-SP SIL Silicone-based joint sealant spray High-durability joint sealant spray for high-moisture, quick-cure environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast-curing spray coating with a short tack free time Proven rain and wash out resistance within a few hours – tested in accordance with ASTM D6904 (as modified for intended exposures) Excellent sprayability and low slump characteristics Quick and easy installation with airless sprayer can help save time and money Applications Sealing building perimeter gaps between floor slabs and exterior curtain wall façades For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 65.9 g/l Base materials: Concrete, Masonry, Gypsum, Metal, Steel Application temperature range: 35 - 104 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 65.9 g/l | Base materials | Concrete, Masonry, Gypsum, Metal, Steel | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Approx. cure time | 2 mm/day | 1 | Can be painted | No | Product Class | Ultimate | Volume per unit | 1153.3 in³ | Color | White | at 75°F/24°C, 50% relative humidity ### ITEMS- 2095007 - Firestop silicone joint spray CFS-SP SIL - Package Size 1 pc - 3537999 - Firestop silicone spray CFS-SP SIL (pall - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Firestop silicone joint spray CFS-SP SIL - 3517096 - Combo - 18 CFS-SP SIL & Graco 595 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Firestop silicone joint spray CFS-SP SIL - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 595 - 3517097 - Combo - 18 CFS-SP SIL & Graco 696 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 18x Firestop silicone joint spray CFS-SP SIL - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 695 - 3517101 - Combo - 54 CFS-SP SIL & Graco 695 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 54x Firestop silicone joint spray CFS-SP SIL - 1x Graco Ultra Max II 695
